title: Ignota's SCP-6581 Pixel Fanart
content:

++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7098720700592065834?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6581 SCP-6581]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6581.mp4, 6581.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7098720700592065834?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6581 by Weiserthanyou
[[/<]]
-----

I like the way this one turned out! I got a little experimental with the color palette on this one. It's not really a real... basic art theory palette but I still think it looks nice! I guess it's KINDA split-complementary? But not really. Normally I'm more strict about exclusively following color theory.

This is also the first piece I did for the SCP for Corgo Campaign! This one is for Weiserthanyou. I'm glad I could be a part of that :)

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
